column2: Small National Park Island Preserve Off Of Ventura
Worth the boat ride to see
Go in the spring to see unlimited seagulls nesting
the gulls are the main attraction on this big rock (not really an island!)
We love Scuba Diving in Anacapa

It depends on what you are looking for -- it can be good or bad
Amazing boat ride to seagull island
Sea kyacking, swimming, kelp forest, island strolls and of course birds!
No shade, too many birds, too noisy
If you like birds and wildlife, then this is for you!
A day trip starting with a boat ride followed by a easy stroll around the island
Not enough hiking to justify an entire day, and seagulls are very annoying.
Best part of visit is the Island packers ferry
Every bit as beautiful as the pictures
A double bonus trip on that day
I had no idea this was there
A stimulating naturalistic experience in the Channel Islands
Nice day out but very bare & dry
So happy to finally explore East Anacapa Island!
A Delightful Voyage to Anacapa Island
What are you waiting for?....GO Now!!
Not as much as we expected

Relaxing end to our California Vacation
